source.432268a8:
#Now, let's check how happiness is related with freedom and which country is happiest.
#Using bubbleplot as it is used for plotting interactive and animated bubble charts using Plotly
bubble1 = bubbleplot(report_2019,x_column='Score',y_column='Freedom to make life choices',bubble_column='Country or region',
                    color_column='Country or region',
                    size_column='GDP per capita',x_title='Happiness',y_title='Freedom',title='Happiness vs Freedom')
py.iplot(bubble1,config={'scrollzoom':True})

#Here we can see that with Freedom of making life choices, People of Finland are the most happiest and South Sudan ,
#Afghanistan comes under unhappy country.

source.4c159dc0: #A Choropleth Map is a map composed of colored polygons. It is used to represent spatial variations of a quantity.
source.3a495950:
#Graph represent how much generous the countries is
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import pandas as pd


fig = go.Figure(data=go.Choropleth(
    locations = report_2019['Country or region'],
    z = report_2019['Generosity'],
    text = report_2019['Country or region'],
    colorscale = 'Earth',
    autocolorscale=True,
    reversescale=True,
    marker_line_color='darkgray',
    marker_line_width=0.5,
    locationmode="country names"
))

fig.update_layout(
    title_text='Generosity',
    geo=dict(
        showframe=True,
        showcoastlines=True,
        showlakes = True,
        showocean=True,
        projection_type='hammer'
    ),
    annotations = [dict(
        x=0.55,
        y=0.1,
        xref='paper',
        yref='paper',
        text='Projection',
        showarrow = False
    )]
)

fig.show()

#We can see that China , Argentina etc are least Generous Countries

                                  locationmode = 'country names',
                                  z = report_2019['Healthy life expectancy'],
                                  colorscale='blues',
                                  marker_line_color='darkgray',
                                  marker_line_width=0.8,
                                  autocolorscale=False,
                                  reversescale=False
                                  ))
fig.update_layout(title_text='Healthy life expectancy',
                 geo=dict(showframe=True,
                         showcoastlines=True,
                         showlakes=True,
                         showocean=True,
                         projection_type='hammer'),
                 annotations=[dict(x=0.8,
                                  y=0.1,
                                  xref='paper',
                                  yref='paper',
                                  text = 'projection',
                                  showarrow=False)])
fig.show()

#Australia , canada , France has most healthy life expectancy
source.e39747c0:
import plotly.graph_objs as go

fig = go.Figure(data=go.Choropleth(locations=report_2019['Country or region'],
                                  locationmode='country names',
                                  autocolorscale=False,
                                  reversescale=True,
                                  marker_line_color='darkgray',
                                  marker_line_width=0.5,
                                  z = report_2019['Social support']))
fig.update_layout(title='Social Support',
                 geo=dict(showframe=True,
                         showocean=True,
                         showlakes=True,
                         showcoastlines=True,
                         projection_type='hammer'),
                 annotations = [dict(x=0.1,
                                   y=0.1,
                                   xref='paper',
                                   yref='paper',
                                   text='Projection',
                                   showarrow=False)])
fig.show()

#Russia, Canada , US are at top in Social Support

fig = go.Figure(data=go.Choropleth(locations = report_2019['Country or region'],
                                  locationmode='country names',
                                  z = report_2019['Freedom to make life choices'],
                                  colorscale='purples',
                                  marker_line_color='darkgray',
                                  marker_line_width=0.8,
                                  reversescale=True,
                                  autocolorscale=False
                                  ))
fig.update_layout(title_text = 'Freedom to make life choices',
                 geo = dict(showframe=True,
                           showocean=True,
                           showlakes=True,
                           showcoastlines=True,
                           projection_type='hammer'),
                 annotations = [dict(x=1.0,
                                    y=1.0,
                                    xref='paper',
                                    yref='paper',
                                    text='projection',
                                    showarrow=True)])
fig.show()

# South Sudan people have least freedom to make life choices whereas Norway , Cambodia have most freedom to make life choices
